comments.content: I don't know if it helps, but the numerals are set in **[Plantin MT (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174505/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Plantin%20MT%20Pro%20-%20Bold&fid=542b141508b5c8899ec921cd60c050ff&fsize=60&text=403896&wrap=2)** which is also used as the latin subset of **DFLiKingHeiU-XB** font by DynaComware Corp. [2002]
